title: Katarina
body: Hi . I like and i want to buy the cat skin for katarina but i can't found this , can someone explain me how i can get that one or from were i can buy ? :D Thank you !

replies.body: It dropped in vs. event I manage to get 2 of those and I play this skin cuzzzzzz it's nice.

Meow!  Kitty Cat Katarina is a l[egacy skin](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins), so it only makes an appearance in the store sometimes or during special events.  If you don't want to wait around for her to make another appearance, you can also try your luck through hextech chests or mystery gifts.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Thank you  :D I hope i will get it from the chests :D
